str.txt: mp5 is the fifth version of the matching pursuit algorithm implemented at the University of Warsaw in C as a command-line program
mp5 is the fifth version of the matching pursuit algorithm implemented at the University of Warsaw in C as a command-line program
mp5 is the fifth version of the matching pursuit algorithm implemented at the University of Warsaw in C as a command-line program

Currently there are four default plugins: FFTSignalTool (a tool which displays a FFT over a signal plot), FFT (a library to calculate FFT needed by FFTSignalTool), Artifact (a plugin to detect artifacts in signal), and PluginToolCommon (a library used by Artifact plugin).
Three default SignalML codecs: EASYS, EDF and RAW
